#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

#define MAX_F 100

int f(int n) {
    int y = 1;
    while (n != 1) {
        if (n % 2 != 0) {
            y++;
        }
        n /= 2;
    }
    return y;
}

int main() {
    // Read first line and ignore
    char buffer[1000];
    fgets(buffer, sizeof(buffer), stdin);

    // Read second line into numbers
    char line[100000];
    fgets(line, sizeof(line), stdin);

    // Parse numbers
    int numbers[100000];
    int count = 0;
    char *token = strtok(line, " ");
    while (token != NULL) {
        numbers[count++] = atoi(token);
        token = strtok(NULL, " ");
    }

    // Compute counts for f(n)
    int counts[MAX_F] = {0};
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        int y = f(numbers[i]);
        if (y < MAX_F) {
            counts[y]++;
        } else {
            // Handle if y exceeds MAX_F, but unlikely
            // For now, ignore or set to 0
        }
    }

    // Calculate total pairs
    int total = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_F; i++) {
        if (counts[i] > 0) {
            total += counts[i] * counts[i] - counts[i];
        }
    }
    total /= 2;

    // Convert total to string for second part
    char s[20];
    sprintf(s, "%d", total);

    // Prepend '0' and process
    char new_s[20];
    new_s[0] = '0';
    strcpy(new_s + 1, s);

    // Process reversed string
    int pmin = 1000;
    int mmin = 0;
    int len = strlen(new_s);
    for (int i = len - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        int v = new_s[i] - '0';
        int npmin = (pmin + (10 - (v + 1))) < (mmin + (10 - v)) ? (pmin + (10 - (v + 1))) : (mmin + (10 - v));
        int nmmin = (pmin + (v + 1)) < (mmin + v) ? (pmin + (v + 1)) : (mmin + v);
        pmin = npmin;
        mmin = nmmin;
    }

    int result = (pmin < mmin) ? pmin : mmin;
    printf("%d\n", result);

    return 0;
}
